n = int(input())
ans = (pow(1,n,5)+pow(2,n,5)+pow(3,n,5)+pow(4,n,5))%5
print(ans)

s = input()
d = int(s[-2:]) % 4
two = [1, 2, 4, 3]
three = [1, 3, 4, 2]
four = [1, 4]
ans = (1 + two[d] + three[d] + four[d % 2]) % 5
print(ans)

n = int(input())
out  = (1 + pow(2,n, 5) + pow(3, n, 5) + pow(4, n, 5)) % 5
print(out)

n = int(input())
if n%2 == 1:
    result = 0
else:
    g =(n%4)+1
    h = 2**g+2
    result = h%5
print(result)

s = ""

length = len(s)
temp = ((int)(s[length - 2])) * 10 + (int)(s[length - 1])
if temp%4==0:
    print("4")
else:
    print("0")
